title: What are the 3 ways to earn $50,000 per year in passive income? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now days alot of people asking about earning money online But one thing I can say earning money online is not an easy task it requires skills , knowledge and the one most inportant thing patience which a lot of people have not Here are some good source of online earning YouTubeU can have a YouTube channel in which u have to monetize ur video for adds provided by Google if u have anything in which u r good at just make a video and post it on YouTube it can be related to teaching , dancing ,technical ,fun anything (2) droppshipin It is a online business in which u can have ur own online store and u can sell any thing on it but first u have learn the basics for this u can use Google ,YouTube, courses etc (3) selling If u are good at something like painting, paper art , arts on stone etc u can sell it on online u have to make page for that u can use insta, fb, whatapp etc Above three source are the best one but it requires a lot of patience so keep learning and growing hope this will help alot of people to understand
